hero.title: The physical rails that make
hero.description: Cloud APIs respond in 2-5 seconds. Grid frequency must balance every second. We build the local execution layer that bridges this gap—giving utilities and homeowners actual control over distributed energy.

dashboard.description: Monitor sites, analyze performance, manage fleets, and automate energy optimization—all from one platform.

developers.description: Build on our platform. API-first design, comprehensive docs, active community.

developers.title: API-first platform for energy applications
developers.description: Build energy apps that respond in milliseconds, not seconds. Our local execution layer handles the physics while you focus on the experience.

hero.title: Local energy coordination
hero.description: The software layer that makes distributed energy actually work. Local execution for speed. Cloud intelligence for optimization. The best of both worlds.

preview.title: See the platform in action

architecture.title: Three-layer architecture
architecture.description: Local execution where speed matters. Cloud intelligence where it adds value.

edge.title: Edge Layer
edge.subtitle: The Zap Gateway
edge.description: Local execution in 200ms. Offline-capable, protocol-agnostic, data sovereign. Runs automations without cloud dependency.

coordination.title: Coordination Layer
coordination.subtitle: Sourceful Platform
coordination.description: Aggregates devices, optimizes energy flows, and interfaces with grid operators. The brain of the operation.

cloud.title: Cloud Layer
cloud.subtitle: Analytics & Intelligence
cloud.description: Long-term analytics, machine learning, and reporting. The cloud does what cloud does best.

localExecution.title: Why local execution matters
localExecution.description1: Grid frequency must balance every second. Cloud APIs respond in 2-5 seconds. This gap is unbridgeable through software optimization alone.
localExecution.description2: Our platform pushes execution to the edge. The Zap gateway responds in 200ms, works offline, and keeps data local. The cloud handles what cloud does best: analytics, optimization, and coordination at scale.
localExecution.metersNote: Compatible with 180M EU smart meters today. More integrations coming.

capabilities.title: Platform capabilities
capabilities.description: Everything you need to manage and optimize distributed energy assets.

deviceManagement.title: Device Management
deviceManagement.description: Register, monitor, and control all connected devices from a single dashboard. Real-time status and remote firmware updates.

energyOptimization.title: Energy Optimization
energyOptimization.description: Automatic load balancing, peak shaving, and arbitrage. AI-powered scheduling based on prices, weather, and usage patterns.

gridServices.title: Grid Services
gridServices.description: Participate in frequency response, demand flexibility, and ancillary services. TSO certifications included.

analytics.title: Analytics & Reporting
analytics.description: Real-time insights, historical analysis, and compliance reporting. Export to any format.

hero.title: The Zap Gateway
hero.description: Local execution at the edge. 200ms response time, offline-capable, protocol-agnostic. The missing piece that makes distributed energy actually work.

features.title: Why the Zap?
features.description: Cloud platforms respond in 2-5 seconds. Grid frequency must balance every second. The Zap bridges this gap with local execution.

speed.title: 200ms Response
speed.description: Local execution means real-time control. No cloud latency, no network dependencies.

offline.title: Offline Capable
offline.description: Keeps working when internet goes down. Essential for critical energy infrastructure.

protocols.title: Protocol Agnostic
protocols.description: P1, Modbus RTU/TCP, MQTT, OCPP 1.6/2.0. Works with your existing equipment.

sovereignty.title: Data Sovereignty
sovereignty.description: Your energy data stays local. Choose what to share with the cloud.

v2x.title: V2X: Your car as a power plant
v2x.description: Turn your EV into a home battery. Export power during peak prices, charge when it's cheap or free. Early access available in 2026.

earn.title: Earn While Parked
earn.description: Your EV can export power during peak prices, earning you money while you sleep or work.

backup.title: Home Backup
backup.description: Keep your lights on during outages. A typical EV battery can power a home for days.

optimize.title: Smart Charging
optimize.description: Automatically charge when prices are low or negative. Save up to 70% on charging costs.

chargers.note: V2X requires a compatible bidirectional charger. We're working with these partners:
